column2: (select ((connection (start_time end_time duration cardinality destination_ip_address outgoing_traffic incoming_traffic  type status)) (port port_number) (binary (application_category application_company application_name executable_name paths version)) (device (name last_ip_address last_logged_on_user)) (user (name id department sid full_name distinguished_name))) (from (connection device port user binary) (where user (ne type (enum "system"))) (where connection (eq destination_ip_address (ip_network '10.0.0.0/8')))) (limit 100000000))

(select ((web_request (id start_time end_time cardinality connections_duration http_status incoming_traffic outgoing_traffic network_response_time web_request_duration)) (domain (name protocol hostname response_size)) (user (name type)) (device (name last_ip_address last_logged_on_user)) (port port_number) (destination ip_address) (binary (application_category application_company application_name executable_name paths version))) (from (web_request domain user device port destination binary) (where user (ne type (enum "system"))) (where destination (eq ip_address (ip_network '10.0.0.0/8')))) (limit 100000000))

(select ((execution (start_time end_time binary_path cardinality duration status)) (binary (application_category application_company application_name executable_name paths version hash)) (user (name)) (device (name last_ip_address))) (from (execution binary user device) (where user (ne type (enum "system")))) (limit 100000000))
